That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime: Isekai Memories Slime IM's Half Anniversary Announcement   Apr 26th 2022         New-York, New-York, April 25, 2022 - Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.'s mobile game for the App Store and Google Play, That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime: ISEKAI Memories (Slime IM), is celebrating six months since the game released with the new event, Isekai Revelry. ------------------------------------   Six Months Since Slime IM's Release!    Isekai Revelry, chock full of spectacular events, is here! Slime IM is holding a new event, Isekai Revelry, to celebrate six months since the game's release!  And, as a thank you for six months of ISEKAI Memories, we'll be holding an awesome campaign that lets players pull Recruits up to 55 times and also offers Login Bonuses and Mission Rewards! *Players who login by May 12 (JST) and then login every day until May 31 (JST) will be able to Recruit up to 55 times.  Event Period: On now until May 31 (Tue) 5:59 UTC (TBC)   Celebrating Slime IM's Half Anniversary! New Anime Promo Video Released!    Here's a brand new anime promo video we made to celebrate Slime IM's Half Anniversary! The video will play as the game's opening intro video when you login, so be sure to check it out!  https://youtu.be/QG4cuWm0O38 ISEKAI Memories - Half Anniversary Anime Promo Video   Get over 1,000 Magicrystals! Plus a 5★ Battle Character Guaranteed Recruit Ticket!    Isekai Revelry Login Bonus - Part 1! We're holding the Isekai Revelry Login Bonus - Part 1 to celebrate the game's Half Anniversary! Get over 1,000 Magicrystals by logging in during the event period! Plus, login for 30 days and get a 5★ Battle Character Guaranteed Recruit Ticket! Event Period: On now until May 31 (Tue) 5:59 UTC (TBC)   Check out the Masked Hero as well as Milim and Veldora decked out in special garb!    Isekai Revelry Recruit Part 1 is on now! Isekai Revelry Recruit Part 1, featuring Masked Hero, the Time Traveler as well as Milim Nava, the Dragon Fist and Veldora Tempest, the Mighty Roar, both decked out in special garb, is on now! The drop rate of 5★ characters is raised from 4% to 5%!  Plus, in the Bingo Missions on now to celebrate Slime IM's Half Anniversary, Chancellors can get 1 Memory Stone for Masked Hero, the Time Traveler, 5 Isekai Revelry Recruit Part 1 Tickets, and 50 Magicrystals!  Event Period: On now until May 31 (Tue) 5:59 UTC (TBC)    Isekai Revelry Once-Daily Free 4★ or Higher Guaranteed Recruit is on now!    To celebrate the release of Isekai Revelry, a Once-Daily Free 4★ or Higher Guaranteed Recruit is on now! This Recruit includes characters that are now in Standard Recruits such as Diablo, The Black Progenitor and Guy Crimson, the Lord of Darkness! Make sure to login every day and pull those free Recruits!  Event Period: On now until May 9 (Mon) 18:59 UTC (TBC)    The Story Event "RYUZIN: Contest of Dragons" is on now!    Veldora, influenced by the sacred writings, is going to take on Milim in boxing, fencing, and Judo?! Plus, get Frey, the Sky Queen for your party as part of a Login Bonus!  Event Period: On now until May 31 (Tue) 5:59 UTC (TBC)    The new area "Eastern Block" & a story for the new area!    Myulan and Soka to appear in town! New buildings for the new area!    Chapters 13 and 14 will be added to the Main Story.    Hinata shows up in the story taken from the anime! Then, in the original stories supervised by Tensura author  Fuse, we'll see all sorts of new developments in Shinsha and Izis's story!  The Half Anniversary will be packed full of awesome content, so please be on the lookout for it!  ------------------------------------   Title: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime: ISEKAI Memories  Game Genre: Nation Building 3D Battle RPG  Retail Price: Free to play with some in-app purchases  Available for: App Store, Google Play  Official Website URL: https://ten-sura-m.bn-ent.net/en/  Store URL:     ・App Store https://apps.apple.com/app/id1577316192?mt=8 ・Google Play https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bandainamcoent.tensuramrkww   Official Social Media Accounts:    ・Facebook @slime.isekaimemories https://www.Facebook.com/slime.isekaimemories/   Copyright:     © Taiki Kawakami, Fuse, KODANSHA/“Ten-Sura” Project © Shiba, Fuse, KODANSHA/“Ten-Sura Diary” Project ©Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.     discuss this in the forum |        bookmark/share with:               Press Release homepage / archives           RightStuf - Anime, Manga and More          ⬈ ⬋ - +                            news          8 comments       Peter Grill and the Philosopher's Time Anime Season 2 Reveals Title, New Cast & Staff, Game   Apr 26, 07:24 8 comments                 anime    Kana Yūki, Shiori Izawa join cast; Seven joins Wolfsbane on animation production ― The official website for the second season of the television anime of Daisuke Hiyama's Peter Grill and the Philosopher's Time (Peter Grill to Kenja no Jikan) manga revealed the second season's title as Peter Grill to Kenja no Jikan Super Extra. That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime: Isekai Memories Slime IM's Half Anniversary Announcement   Apr 26th 2022         New-York, New-York, April 25, 2022 - Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.'s mobile game for the App Store and Google Play, That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime: ISEKAI Memories (Slime IM), is celebrating six months since the game released with the new event, Isekai Revelry. ------------------------------------   Six Months Since Slime IM's Release!    Isekai Revelry, chock full of spectacular events, is here! Slime IM is holding a new event, Isekai Revelry, to celebrate six months since the game's release!  And, as a thank you for six months of ISEKAI Memories, we'll be holding an awesome campaign that lets players pull Recruits up to 55 times and also offers Login Bonuses and Mission Rewards! *Players who login by May 12 (JST) and then login every day until May 31 (JST) will be able to Recruit up to 55 times.  Event Period: On now until May 31 (Tue) 5:59 UTC (TBC)   Celebrating Slime IM's Half Anniversary! New Anime Promo Video Released!    Here's a brand new anime promo video we made to celebrate Slime IM's Half Anniversary! The video will play as the game's opening intro video when you login, so be sure to check it out!  https://youtu.be/QG4cuWm0O38 ISEKAI Memories - Half Anniversary Anime Promo Video   Get over 1,000 Magicrystals! Plus a 5★ Battle Character Guaranteed Recruit Ticket!    Isekai Revelry Login Bonus - Part 1! We're holding the Isekai Revelry Login Bonus - Part 1 to celebrate the game's Half Anniversary! Get over 1,000 Magicrystals by logging in during the event period! Plus, login for 30 days and get a 5★ Battle Character Guaranteed Recruit Ticket! Event Period: On now until May 31 (Tue) 5:59 UTC (TBC)   Check out the Masked Hero as well as Milim and Veldora decked out in special garb!    Isekai Revelry Recruit Part 1 is on now! Isekai Revelry Recruit Part 1, featuring Masked Hero, the Time Traveler as well as Milim Nava, the Dragon Fist and Veldora Tempest, the Mighty Roar, both decked out in special garb, is on now! The drop rate of 5★ characters is raised from 4% to 5%!  Plus, in the Bingo Missions on now to celebrate Slime IM's Half Anniversary, Chancellors can get 1 Memory Stone for Masked Hero, the Time Traveler, 5 Isekai Revelry Recruit Part 1 Tickets, and 50 Magicrystals!  Event Period: On now until May 31 (Tue) 5:59 UTC (TBC)    Isekai Revelry Once-Daily Free 4★ or Higher Guaranteed Recruit is on now!    To celebrate the release of Isekai Revelry, a Once-Daily Free 4★ or Higher Guaranteed Recruit is on now! This Recruit includes characters that are now in Standard Recruits such as Diablo, The Black Progenitor and Guy Crimson, the Lord of Darkness! Make sure to login every day and pull those free Recruits!  Event Period: On now until May 9 (Mon) 18:59 UTC (TBC)    The Story Event "RYUZIN: Contest of Dragons" is on now!    Veldora, influenced by the sacred writings, is going to take on Milim in boxing, fencing, and Judo?! Plus, get Frey, the Sky Queen for your party as part of a Login Bonus!  Event Period: On now until May 31 (Tue) 5:59 UTC (TBC)    The new area "Eastern Block" & a story for the new area!    Myulan and Soka to appear in town! New buildings for the new area!    Chapters 13 and 14 will be added to the Main Story.    Hinata shows up in the story taken from the anime! Then, in the original stories supervised by Tensura author  Fuse, we'll see all sorts of new developments in Shinsha and Izis's story!  The Half Anniversary will be packed full of awesome content, so please be on the lookout for it!  ------------------------------------   Title: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime: ISEKAI Memories  Game Genre: Nation Building 3D Battle RPG  Retail Price: Free to play with some in-app purchases  Available for: App Store, Google Play  Official Website URL: https://ten-sura-m.bn-ent.net/en/  Store URL:     ・App Store https://apps.apple.com/app/id1577316192?mt=8 ・Google Play https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bandainamcoent.tensuramrkww   Official Social Media Accounts:    ・Facebook @slime.isekaimemories https://www.Facebook.com/slime.isekaimemories/   Copyright:     © Taiki Kawakami, Fuse, KODANSHA/“Ten-Sura” Project © Shiba, Fuse, KODANSHA/“Ten-Sura Diary” Project ©Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.     discuss this in the forum |        bookmark/share with:               Press Release homepage / archives           RightStuf - Anime, Manga and More          ⬈ ⬋ - +                            news          8 comments       Peter Grill and the Philosopher's Time Anime Season 2 Reveals Title, New Cast & Staff, Game   Apr 26, 07:24 8 comments                 anime    Kana Yūki, Shiori Izawa join cast; Seven joins Wolfsbane on animation production ― The official website for the second season of the television anime of Daisuke Hiyama's Peter Grill and the Philosopher's Time (Peter Grill to Kenja no Jikan) manga revealed the second season's title as Peter Grill to Kenja no Jikan Super Extra. Visit news.dexclub.com for all the latest news in Thai.                That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime: Isekai Memories Slime IM's Half Anniversary Announcement   Apr 26th 2022         New-York, New-York, April 25, 2022 - Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.'s mobile game for the App Store and Google Play, That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime: ISEKAI Memories (Slime IM), is celebrating six months since the game released with the new event, Isekai Revelry. ------------------------------------   Six Months Since Slime IM's Release!    Isekai Revelry, chock full of spectacular events, is here! Slime IM is holding a new event, Isekai Revelry, to celebrate six months since the game's release!  And, as a thank you for six months of ISEKAI Memories, we'll be holding an awesome campaign that lets players pull Recruits up to 55 times and also offers Login Bonuses and Mission Rewards! *Players who login by May 12 (JST) and then login every day until May 31 (JST) will be able to Recruit up to 55 times.  Event Period: On now until May 31 (Tue) 5:59 UTC (TBC)   Celebrating Slime IM's Half Anniversary! New Anime Promo Video Released!    Here's a brand new anime promo video we made to celebrate Slime IM's Half Anniversary! The video will play as the game's opening intro video when you login, so be sure to check it out!  https://youtu.be/QG4cuWm0O38 ISEKAI Memories - Half Anniversary Anime Promo Video   Get over 1,000 Magicrystals! Plus a 5★ Battle Character Guaranteed Recruit Ticket!    Isekai Revelry Login Bonus - Part 1! We're holding the Isekai Revelry Login Bonus - Part 1 to celebrate the game's Half Anniversary! Get over 1,000 Magicrystals by logging in during the event period! Plus, login for 30 days and get a 5★ Battle Character Guaranteed Recruit Ticket! Event Period: On now until May 31 (Tue) 5:59 UTC (TBC)   Check out the Masked Hero as well as Milim and Veldora decked out in special garb!    Isekai Revelry Recruit Part 1 is on now! Isekai Revelry Recruit Part 1, featuring Masked Hero, the Time Traveler as well as Milim Nava, the Dragon Fist and Veldora Tempest, the Mighty Roar, both decked out in special garb, is on now! The drop rate of 5★ characters is raised from 4% to 5%!  Plus, in the Bingo Missions on now to celebrate Slime IM's Half Anniversary, Chancellors can get 1 Memory Stone for Masked Hero, the Time Traveler, 5 Isekai Revelry Recruit Part 1 Tickets, and 50 Magicrystals!  Event Period: On now until May 31 (Tue) 5:59 UTC (TBC)    Isekai Revelry Once-Daily Free 4★ or Higher Guaranteed Recruit is on now!    To celebrate the release of Isekai Revelry, a Once-Daily Free 4★ or Higher Guaranteed Recruit is on now! This Recruit includes characters that are now in Standard Recruits such as Diablo, The Black Progenitor and Guy Crimson, the Lord of Darkness! Make sure to login every day and pull those free Recruits!  Event Period: On now until May 9 (Mon) 18:59 UTC (TBC)    The Story Event "RYUZIN: Contest of Dragons" is on now!    Veldora, influenced by the sacred writings, is going to take on Milim in boxing, fencing, and Judo?! Plus, get Frey, the Sky Queen for your party as part of a Login Bonus!  Event Period: On now until May 31 (Tue) 5:59 UTC (TBC)    The new area "Eastern Block" & a story for the new area!    Myulan and Soka to appear in town! New buildings for the new area!    Chapters 13 and 14 will be added to the Main Story.    Hinata shows up in the story taken from the anime! Then, in the original stories supervised by Tensura author  Fuse, we'll see all sorts of new developments in Shinsha and Izis's story!  The Half Anniversary will be packed full of awesome content, so please be on the lookout for it!  ------------------------------------   Title: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime: ISEKAI Memories  Game Genre: Nation Building 3D Battle RPG  Retail Price: Free to play with some in-app purchases  Available for: App Store, Google Play  Official Website URL: https://ten-sura-m.bn-ent.net/en/  Store URL:     ・App Store https://apps.apple.com/app/id1577316192?mt=8 ・Google Play https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bandainamcoent.tensuramrkww   Official Social Media Accounts:    ・Facebook @slime.isekaimemories https://www.Facebook.com/slime.isekaimemories/   Copyright:     © Taiki Kawakami, Fuse, KODANSHA/“Ten-Sura” Project © Shiba, Fuse, KODANSHA/“Ten-Sura Diary” Project ©Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.     discuss this in the forum |        bookmark/share with:               Press Release homepage / archives           RightStuf - Anime, Manga and More          ⬈ ⬋ - +                            news          8 comments       Peter Grill and the Philosopher's Time Anime Season 2 Reveals Title, New Cast & Staff, Game   Apr 26, 07:24 8 comments                 anime    Kana Yūki, Shiori Izawa join cast; Seven joins Wolfsbane on animation production ― The official website for the second season of the television anime of Daisuke Hiyama's Peter Grill and the Philosopher's Time (Peter Grill to Kenja no Jikan) manga revealed the second season's title as Peter Grill to Kenja no Jikan Super Extra. Data: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime: Isekai Memories Slime IM's Half Anniversary Announcement   Apr 26th 2022         New-York, New-York, April 25, 2022 - Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.'s mobile game for the App Store and Google Play, That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime: ISEKAI Memories (Slime IM), is celebrating six months since the game released with the new event, Isekai Revelry. ------------------------------------   Six Months Since Slime IM's Release!    Isekai Revelry, chock full of spectacular events, is here! Slime IM is holding a new event, Isekai Revelry, to celebrate six months since the game's release!  And, as a thank you for six months of ISEKAI Memories, we'll be holding an awesome campaign that lets players pull Recruits up to 55 times and also offers Login Bonuses and Mission Rewards! *Players who login by May 12 (JST) and then login every day until May 31 (JST) will be able to Recruit up to 55 times.  Event Period: On now until May 31 (Tue) 5:59 UTC (TBC)   Celebrating Slime IM's Half Anniversary! New Anime Promo Video Released!    Here's a brand new anime promo video we made to celebrate Slime IM's Half Anniversary! The video will play as the game's opening intro video when you login, so be sure to check it out!  https://youtu.be/QG4cuWm0O38 ISEKAI Memories - Half Anniversary Anime Promo Video   Get over 1,000 Magicrystals! Plus a 5★ Battle Character Guaranteed Recruit Ticket!    Isekai Revelry Login Bonus - Part 1! We're holding the Isekai Revelry Login Bonus - Part 1 to celebrate the game's Half Anniversary! Get over 1,000 Magicrystals by logging in during the event period! Plus, login for 30 days and get a 5★ Battle Character Guaranteed Recruit Ticket! Event Period: On now until May 31 (Tue) 5:59 UTC (TBC)   Check out the Masked Hero as well as Milim and Veldora decked out in special garb!    Isekai Revelry Recruit Part 1 is on now! Isekai Revelry Recruit Part 1, featuring Masked Hero, the Time Traveler as well as Milim Nava, the Dragon Fist and Veldora Tempest, the Mighty Roar, both decked out in special garb, is on now! The drop rate of 5★ characters is raised from 4% to 5%!  Plus, in the Bingo Missions on now to celebrate Slime IM's Half Anniversary, Chancellors can get 1 Memory Stone for Masked Hero, the Time Traveler, 5 Isekai Revelry Recruit Part 1 Tickets, and 50 Magicrystals!  Event Period: On now until May 31 (Tue) 5:59 UTC (TBC)    Isekai Revelry Once-Daily Free 4★ or Higher Guaranteed Recruit is on now!    To celebrate the release of Isekai Revelry, a Once-Daily Free 4★ or Higher Guaranteed Recruit is on now! This Recruit includes characters that are now in Standard Recruits such as Diablo, The Black Progenitor and Guy Crimson, the Lord of Darkness! Make sure to login every day and pull those free Recruits!  Event Period: On now until May 9 (Mon) 18:59 UTC (TBC)    The Story Event "RYUZIN: Contest of Dragons" is on now!    Veldora, influenced by the sacred writings, is going to take on Milim in boxing, fencing, and Judo?! Plus, get Frey, the Sky Queen for your party as part of a Login Bonus!  Event Period: On now until May 31 (Tue) 5:59 UTC (TBC)    The new area "Eastern Block" & a story for the new area!    Myulan and Soka to appear in town! New buildings for the new area!    Chapters 13 and 14 will be added to the Main Story.    Hinata shows up in the story taken from the anime! Then, in the original stories supervised by Tensura author  Fuse, we'll see all sorts of new developments in Shinsha and Izis's story!  The Half Anniversary will be packed full of awesome content, so please be on the lookout for it!  ------------------------------------   Title: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime: ISEKAI Memories  Game Genre: Nation Building 3D Battle RPG  Retail Price: Free to play with some in-app purchases  Available for: App Store, Google Play  Official Website URL: https://ten-sura-m.bn-ent.net/en/  Store URL:     ・App Store https://apps.apple.com/app/id1577316192?mt=8 ・Google Play https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bandainamcoent.tensuramrkww   Official Social Media Accounts:    ・Facebook @slime.isekaimemories https://www.Facebook.com/slime.isekaimemories/   Copyright:     © Taiki Kawakami, Fuse, KODANSHA/“Ten-Sura” Project © Shiba, Fuse, KODANSHA/“Ten-Sura Diary” Project ©Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.     discuss this in the forum |        bookmark/share with:               Press Release homepage / archives
